channel.title: sqlite on Varun Pant
channel.description: Recent content in sqlite on Varun Pant

item.title: sqlite3 Bulk Import CSV from command line
item.description: I absolutely love SQLite, be it windows, linux or mac, this light weight database never stops to amaze me. Few days ago I wanted to import a chunk of CSV data, which was 4 GB in size into a table in SQLite. I generally use Firefox ’s sqlite-manager plug-in for usual tasks with SQLite database ,hence decided to use the import interface . I have had a very good experience with this GUI tool and it has rarely failed me, but this time I was disappointed.
